questions.question: A pipe of diameter d1 = 22cm and length L = 1912m connecting two reservoirs having difference of water level as 24m. If an additional pipe of diameter d2 = 22cm and length L2 = 1217m is attached to the last 1217m length of the existing pipe. Find the increase in the discharge through the pipe. Take f = 0.15. Refer diagram from simulation.

A pipe of diameter d1 = 20cm and length L = 1931m connecting two reservoirs having difference of water level as 22m. Determine the discharge through the pipe. If an additional pipe of diameter d2 = 20cm and length L2 = 1213m is attached to the last 1213m length of the existing pipe. Find the increase in the discharge through the pipe. Take f = 0.15. Refer diagram from simulation.
